---
title: "Analysis of the UK Biobank data"
---

We apply KnockoffZoom to some traits in the <a target="_blank" href="https://www.ukbiobank.ac.uk/">UK Biobank</a> data and obtain many new findings. To learn more, read the accompanying <a target="_blank" href="https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/631390v1">paper</a>.

To produce more plots like the one below and explore our results interactively, visit: <a target="_blank" href="https://msesia.shinyapps.io/knockoffzoom/">https://msesia.shinyapps.io/knockoffzoom/</a>
